blogs.title: Nikola Founder Found Guilty Of Fraud
blogs.body: The founder of electric pickup manufacturer Nikola faces 20 years in prison after being found guilty of fraud. Trevor Milton stepped down from his role as chief executive of the electric vehicle manu
